itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, March 22, 2013
description: Casual dining takes a backseat to more informal restaurant chains. Mississippi River mayors unite to fight for federal infrastructure funding. And it's going to be another long weekend in Cyprus as the country's government scrambles to come up with a new bailout plan. How are countries around the continent reacting?
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, March 22, 2013
teaser: Casual dining takes a backseat to more informal restaurant chains. Mississippi River mayors unite to fight for federal infrastructure funding. And it's going to be another long weekend in Cyprus as the country's government scrambles to come up with a new bailout plan. How are countries around the continent reacting?
byline: Scott Tong, David Gura, Adam Allington, Sara Evans, David Brancaccio, Mitchell Hartman, Sabri Ben-Achour and Jeremy Hobson
